title: Retiens la nuit
text:
"Retiens la nuit" is a song by French singer <a href="Johnny%20Hallyday">Johnny Hallyday</a> from his 1961 studio album "<a href="Salut%20les%20copains%20%28album%29">Salut les copains</a>". It was also released as an <a href="Extended%20play">EP</a> (in late 1961 or early 1962) and as a <a href="single%20%28music%29">single</a>.
Composition and writing.
The song was written by <a href="Charles%20Aznavour">Charles Aznavour</a> and composed by <a href="Georges%20Garvarentz">Georges Garvarentz</a>.
Commercial performance.
In France the single spent nine weeks at no. 1 on the singles sales chart (in March–May 1962).
Track listing.
7" single Philips 372 946 PF (1961, France etc.)
7" EP Philips 432.739 BE (1962, France etc.)
Cover versions.
The song has been covered by <a href="Charles%20Aznavour">Charles Aznavour</a>.
